DOC.brief_summary: The present study was designed to evaluate effect of yoga intervention on patients having frequent tension type headache.
DOC.brief_title: Yoga Intervention Study on Episodic Tension Type Headache
DOC.criteria: aged between 18 to 60 years more than 5 but fewer than 15 headache episodes per month headache intensity moderate to severe Patients on antipsychotic, antidepressant or any prophylactic medication pregnancy Taking psychotherapy or any other alternative medicine migraine headache more than 1 day a month pain disorder, psychiatric or medical disorder requiring immediate treatment, headache due to sinusitis, eyestrain, cervical spondylosis and posttraumatic headaches
